text: The Kharg () was a modified fleet replenishment oiler of the Islamic Republic of Iran Navy, named after Kharg Island. It was launched in 1977 and was delivered to Iran in 1984. On 2 June 2021, Kharg caught fire and sank near Jask in the Gulf of Oman. Kharg was the largest naval vessel of Iran in terms of tonnage. ==References== Category:2021 disasters in Asia Category:2020s disasters in Iran Category:2021 fires in Asia Category:June 2021 events Category:Shipwrecks Category:Transport disasters in Asia Category:2021 in Iran
title: IRIS Kharg
